de: Genießen Sie Ruhe, Komfort und eine familiäre Atmosphäre. Sie finden hier u. a. 2 Schwimmbecken und ein Planschbecken für die Kleinen.
en:
Whether you choose to pitch your tent, rent a mobile home or a chalet… you will enjoy a real nature and family campsite and take a well-earned rest at “La Source” Campsite in Southern Ardèche.

The La Source campsite is situated 300m from the picturesque village of Berrias and Casteljau, a neighbouring village where quietness and gentle way of life prevail as the little stream of Berre slowly flows at the end of the campsite.

An authentic village with its beautiful stone houses, its bridge over the Granzon and its ducks, its source (which inspired the name of our campsite), its hamlets nearby, its walking trails and its Heritage sites, sometimes not well-known such as the Templar Commandery of Jalès, the fabulous Païolive Wood, its dolmens, its Berriasian stratotype… (Berrias, which gave its name to this limestone layer of the Cretaceous Period is known by geologists all over the world!)

In short, just a village but full of character which is worth a visit!

You will enjoy the 2 swimming-pools and the paddling- pool, the free-access spa (for adults), the 3-star comfort amenities, the wide range of accommodation, from standard ones to glamping options, its green spaces and playgrounds for children or older ones, the mini-farm for the delight of your little ones and family entertainments.

You will discover the wonderful sites in the neighbourhood, such as the Païolive Wood, the Chassezac Gorges, the river Ardèche and its majestic Pont d’Arc, its fabulous Gorges, the Pont d’Arc Cavern, a replica of the Chauvet Cave, caves and villages full of character such as Balazuc and Banne….

Whether you choose to pitch your tent, rent a mobile home or a chalet… you will enjoy a real nature and family campsite and take a well-earned rest at “La Source” Campsite in Southern Ardèche.

The La Source campsite is situated 300m from the picturesque village of Berrias and Casteljau, a neighbouring village where quietness and gentle way of life prevail as the little stream of Berre slowly flows at the end of the campsite.

An authentic village with its beautiful stone houses, its bridge over the Granzon and its ducks, its source (which inspired the name of our campsite), its hamlets nearby, its walking trails and its Heritage sites, sometimes not well-known such as the Templar Commandery of Jalès, the fabulous Païolive Wood, its dolmens, its Berriasian stratotype… (Berrias, which gave its name to this limestone layer of the Cretaceous Period is known by geologists all over the world!)

In short, just a village but full of character which is worth a visit!

You will enjoy the 2 swimming-pools and the paddling- pool, the free-access spa (for adults), the 3-star comfort amenities, the wide range of accommodation, from standard ones to glamping options, its green spaces and playgrounds for children or older ones, the mini-farm for the delight of your little ones and family entertainments.

You will discover the wonderful sites in the neighbourhood, such as the Païolive Wood, the Chassezac Gorges, the river Ardèche and its majestic Pont d’Arc, its fabulous Gorges, the Pont d’Arc Cavern, a replica of the Chauvet Cave, caves and villages full of character such as Balazuc and Banne….

Choosing our campsite means taking time together to live and share friendly moments which make our happiest holiday memories.

In short, if you stay with us, you will find:
- a protected natural setting
- a cosy human-sized campsite
- a helpful staff, a warm welcome
- a family and friendly atmosphere
- a real camping spirit and
- quietness to unwind!


See you soon in Ardèche!

  Nathalie & Jean-Christophe
it: La Source è un tranquillo campeggio familiare a misura d'uomo, che sarà per voi un luogo rilassante, ideale per le famiglie con bambini piccoli o per i campeggiatori in cerca di pace e natura.
fr: La Source, camping résolument familial et calme, à taille humaine, qui sera pour vous un lieu reposant, idéal en famille avec de jeunes enfants ou pour campeurs en quête de calme et de nature.
nl: La Source is een rustige familiecamping op menselijke schaal, waar u tot rust kunt komen, ideaal voor gezinnen met jonge kinderen of voor kampeerders die op zoek zijn naar rust en natuur.
es: La Source es un camping familiar tranquilo a escala humana, que le resultará relajante, ideal para familias con niños pequeños o para campistas en busca de paz y naturaleza.

de:
Ein sicherer und geselliger Aufenthalt im Freien ist möglich! Mit unserem weitläufigen Gelände und den abgegrenzten Stellplätzen verpflichten wir uns, Ihnen die bestmöglichen Hygiene- und Sicherheitsbedingungen zu bieten. Wir werden uns selbstverständlich weiterhin an die Richtlinien und das Gesundheitsprotokoll halten, die im Sommer 2020 eingeführt werden, wenn die Situation es erfordert
 (Verstärkte Reinigung und Desinfektion, Bereitstellung von hydroalkoholischem Gel, einfache Unterscheidung auf unserem Freiluftgelände, Bewegungsrichtung, Einhaltung der Barrieregesten, Anpassung der Animationen usw.)
en:
Spending a holiday in the open air, in complete safety and with conviviality is possible! With our spacious grounds and marked pitches we are committed to offering you the best possible hygiene and safety conditions. We will of course continue to respect the guidelines and sanitary protocol put in place in the summer of 2020 if the situation requires it
 (Reinforced cleaning and disinfection, provision of hydroalcoholic gel, easy distancing on our open-air site, direction of circulation, respect of barrier gestures, adaptation of animations...)
it:
È possibile trascorrere una vacanza all'aria aperta, in totale sicurezza e convivialità! Con i nostri ampi terreni e le piazzole delimitate, ci impegniamo a offrirvi le migliori condizioni igieniche e di sicurezza possibili. Naturalmente continueremo a rispettare le linee guida e il protocollo sanitario messo in atto nell'estate del 2020, se la situazione lo richiederà
 (Pulizia e disinfezione rafforzate, fornitura di gel idroalcolico, facilità di distanziamento nel nostro sito all'aperto, direzione di circolazione, rispetto dei gesti della barriera, adattamento delle animazioni)?
fr:
Passer un séjour en plein air, en toute sécurité et avec convivialité c’est possible ! Avec notre terrain spacieux, aux des emplacements délimités nous nous engageons à vous offrir les meilleures conditions d’hygiène et de sécurité possibles. Nous continuerions de respecter bien entendu les directives et protocole sanitaire mis en place à l’été 2020 si la situation l’exigeait. 
 (Nettoyage et désinfection renforcés, mise à disposition de gel  hydroalcoolique, distanciation aisée sur notre terrain en plein air, sens de circulation, respect  des gestes barrières, adaptation des animations…)
nl:
Het is mogelijk een vakantie in de open lucht door te brengen, in alle veiligheid en met gezelligheid! Met ons ruime terrein en onze afgebakende staanplaatsen streven wij ernaar u de best mogelijke hygiëne en veiligheid te bieden. Wij zullen uiteraard de in de zomer van 2020 ingevoerde richtsnoeren en het sanitaire protocol blijven naleven indien de situatie dit vereist
 (Versterkte reiniging en ontsmetting, verstrekking van hydroalcoholische gel, gemakkelijke afstand op ons terrein in de open lucht, circulatierichting, naleving van de barrièregebaren, aanpassing van de animaties?)
es:
Es posible pasar unas vacaciones al aire libre, con total seguridad y convivencia Con nuestros amplios terrenos y parcelas señalizadas, nos comprometemos a ofrecerle las mejores condiciones de higiene y seguridad. Por supuesto, seguiremos respetando las directrices y el protocolo sanitario establecidos en el verano de 2020 si la situación lo requiere
 (Limpieza y desinfección reforzadas, suministro de gel hidroalcohólico, distanciamiento fácil en nuestro emplazamiento al aire libre, sentido de la circulación, respeto de los gestos de barrera, adaptación de las animaciones...)

hasBeenPublishedBy.schema:legalName: Agence de Développement Touristique de l'Ardèche - source : Apidae Tourisme

de: In der Saison von 9:00 bis 12:00 Uhr und von 14:00 bis 19:00 Uhr. In der Nebensaison sind wir von Montag bis Samstag von 9:00 bis 12:00 Uhr und von 13:30 bis 18:00 Uhr telefonisch erreichbar, außer Mittwoch- und Samstagnachmittag.
en: In season from 9 a.m. to 12 p.m. and from 2 p.m. to 7 p.m. In low season, we can be reached by phone from Monday to Saturday from 9 am to 12 am and from 1.30 pm to 6 pm except Wednesday & Saturday afternoon.
it: In stagione dalle 9.00 alle 12.00 e dalle 14.00 alle 19.00. In bassa stagione, siamo raggiungibili telefonicamente dal lunedì al sabato dalle 9 alle 12 e dalle 13.30 alle 18, tranne il mercoledì e il sabato pomeriggio.
fr: En saison de 9 h à 12 h et de 14 h à 19 h. En hors saison, nous sommes joignables par tél du lundi au samedi de 9 h à 12 h et de 13 h 30 à 18 h sauf mercredi & samedi après midi .
nl: In het seizoen van 9 tot 12 uur en van 14 tot 19 uur. In het laagseizoen zijn wij telefonisch bereikbaar van maandag tot zaterdag van 9 tot 12 uur en van 13.30 tot 18 uur, behalve op woensdag- en zaterdagmiddag.
es: En temporada, de 9.00 a 12.00 y de 14.00 a 19.00. En temporada baja, puede ponerse en contacto con nosotros por teléfono de lunes a sábado de 9.00 a 12.00 y de 13.30 a 18.00, excepto los miércoles y sábados por la tarde.
